dcterms:description: FAUST contains 100 shapes labeled with ground-truth correspondences, used for evaluating human shape matching performance.

dcterms:description: SCAPE contains 71 labeled shapes used for evaluating human shape matching performance, split into training and testing sets.

dcterms:description: SHREC’19 contains 44 labeled shapes with the presence of a partial shape and 430 shape pairs in total, used for testing generalizability in human shape matching.
dcterms:title: SHREC’19 Dataset

dcterms:description: SMAL is a four-legged animal shape dataset with five categories, used for non-isometric matching.

dcterms:description: PASCAL VOC is a dataset with annotated keypoints for training and testing in the context of keypoint matching across natural images.
